flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in age between Joel and his dad is 32 - 5 = <<32-5=27>>27 years.
When you double this gap in years, you have 27 x 2 = <<27*2=54>>54.
When his dad is 54, Joel will be 54 / 2 = <<54/2=72>>72 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27.0, not 72.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
